origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'InsuranceAPI.get_risk_management_report', 'description': 'This function retrieves the risk management report of a specified insurance company based on the report type.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'companyName', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The name of the insurance company.'}, {'name': 'reportType', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The type of report to retrieve, e.g., latest, annual, quarterly.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'report', 'description': 'The risk management report in text format.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 InsuranceAPI.get_risk_management_report, 它的参数输入如下: 'companyName'是'XYZ Insurance', 'reportType'是'latest'.
